game.name: DCS: F-14B Operation Sandworm Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: It is year 1998. Tension is building up in the Persian Gulf region. Violations of human rights, demonstrations terminated by military and executions of political prisoners in Iran have led to financial sanctions set by United States and European Union.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It is year 1998. Tension is building up in the Persian Gulf region. Violations of human rights, demonstrations terminated by military and executions of political prisoners in Iran have led to financial sanctions set by United States and European Union.
